Posts.Content: Sep 7, 2012 04:46PM clasical wrote: This is what they call pulsed electromagnetic field therapy, I beleive. It is used in a number of clinics, and there are few makers of such devices, I am told. But for brain mets, in Europe they use mostly short wave therapy. So I am puzzled, and looking for better info, to get to the bottom of this issue.  Anybody with experience in such therapies? like German clinics, Korean clinics, Japanese clinics?
